Abstract
In this short note we show that the method introduced by Beibel and
Lerche in [1] for solving certain optimal stopping problems for Brownian
motion can be applied as well to some optimal stopping problems involving
processes with one-sided jumps.
Keywords: Optimal stopping problems, spectrally negative Levy processes, stable
processses, generalised Ornstein-Uhlenbeck processes.
